Majority.from sentence: Majority is a basic baseline method , which assigns the largest sentiment polarity in the training set to each sample in the test set .

LSTM.from sentence: LSTM only uses one LSTM network to model the context and get the hidden state of each word .

TD - LSTM.from sentence: TD - LSTM adopts two long short - term memory ( LSTM ) networks to model the left context with target and the right context with target respectively .

AE - LSTM.from sentence: AE - LSTM represents targets with aspect embeddings .

ATAE - LSTM.from sentence: ATAE - LSTM is developed based on AE - LSTM .
